author: Imran Gowhar
text:
Three days after some African nationals came under attack in Soledevanahalli following a fatal accident involving a Sudanese national, four persons have been detained on suspicion of molesting and stripping a 24-year-old student from Tanzania that night.

On Wednesday, a chilling account of the Sunday night incident emerged. In her complaint, the student recalled the ordeal she and three of her friends faced when the locals attacked them.

The unsuspecting Tanzanian nationals had reached the spot, near Hesaraghatta, almost after half-an- hour of the accident in which a 35-year-old woman was mowed down by the car driven by a Sudanese national. The group was chased, assaulted, and the girl’s clothes were torn by the attackers, she said. A good Samaritan from the area offered her his t-shirt, before the group ran into a BMTC bus, but were cornered by the mob in the bus, she added. Eventually, four locals formed a human chain around the girl and led her to safety.
title: Police detain 4 suspects
